description: This file is a shell script for network connectivity testing and self-healing actions, including ping tests, DNS resolution checks, and device reboot commands.

methods.name: getCorrectiveActionState
methods.description: Retrieves the current state of the corrective action setting.

methods.name: calcRandTimetoStartPing
methods.description: Calculates a random delay before starting the ping test.

methods.name: resetRouter
methods.description: Triggers a device reboot to reset the router.

methods.name: resetNeeded
methods.description: Decides whether a reset is needed based on the process and triggers reboot if necessary.

methods.name: runDNSPingTest
methods.description: Performs a DNS resolution test and initiates corrective actions if the test fails.

methods.name: runPingTest
methods.description: Executes a ping test to the default gateway and resets the device if the test fails.
